Examples.Data: from Door import Door treedoor = Door() treedoor.close()
day_of_week = input(‘Enter your favorite day of the week’) print day_of_week

from Tower import Tower tower_room = Tower() area = tower_room.get_area() print area
from GlassElevator import GlassElevator glass_elevator = GlassElevator() while glass_elevator.at_top() == False: glass_elevator.go_to_floor(1)
for i in range(10): print i
